name: 施陽正
objective: 本課程的主要目的是介紹計算流體力學方法在工程上的應用，使學生能利用計算流力方法配合電腦的快速運算能力以解決工程上與能源、冷凍空調及熱流相關的問題。課程內容主要包括：計算流力簡介、基礎熱流方程式、紊流模式、有限差分法簡介、有限體積法簡介、套裝軟體應用以及案例分析。
schedule:
1.Introduction
2.228 休假
3.Governing Equations, I
4.Governing Equations, II
5.Basics of Finite-Difference Method, I
6.Basics of Finite-Difference Method, II
7.FLUENT Training, I
8.FLUENT Training, II
9.FLUENT Training, III
10.Introduction to Finite-Volume Method, I
11.Introduction to Finite-Volume Method, II
12.Introduction to Finite-Volume Method, III
13.Introduction to FLUENT, I
14.Introduction to FLUENT, II
15.Introduction to FLUENT, III
16.端午節 休假
17.Turbulence Modeling
18.Final Report
scorePolicy: 出席率與作業 40%, 考試(上機) 30% , 期末報告 30%
materials:
1. Versteeg, H.K, W. Malalasekera (2007), An Introduction to 
   Computational Fluid Dynamics---The Finite Volume Method. 
2. Patankar, S.V. (1980), Numerical Heat Transfer and Fluid Flow.
3. Anderson, D.A., J.C. Tannehill, R.H. Pletcher (1984,1997), 
   Computational Fluid Mechanics and Heat Transfer.
